# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.3.0] - 2024-01-10

### Documentation

- Add CHANGELOG.md

### Features

- Update to arrow v49
- Support ARROW_CAST_GUESSING_BOUND_YEARS env at build-time
